title: France rugby coach: Who has led the men's team over the years? ...
snippet: It was a largely uninspiring stint in charge, which included a series defeat to New Zealand down under and uninspiring Six Nations campaigns. At the 2019 Rugby World Cup, Brunel was in charge in name only, with Fabien Galthie present in the coach’s box for every game as the team exited in the quarter finals again.

title: Fabien Galthié - Wikipedia
snippet: Fabien Galthié (French pronunciation: [fabjɛ̃ ɡaltie]; born 20 March 1969) is a French rugby union coach and former player, currently the head coach of the France national team. His usual position was at scrum-half. He played much of his club rugby for Colomiers, and later on in his career, ...

title: France national rugby union team coaches - FamousFix.com list
snippet: The list France national rugby union team coaches includes Marc Lièvremont, Fabien Galthié, Daniel Dubroca, Bernard Laporte and Jacques Fouroux.

title: Fabien Galthie’s right-hand man exits after France’s World Cup failure : Planet Rugby
snippet: France head coach Fabien Galthie with Raphael Ibanez behind him. France are in search for a new team manager after reports stated Raphael Ibanez had left his position in the set-up.

title: France national rugby union team - Wikipedia
